name: 教師教學研究
description: 本科目為課程與教學研究所碩士班之基礎課程，透過對當代重要教學理論及教學議題的介紹、研讀與討論，期能掌握教學研究的發展脈絡與研究趨勢，對重要教學議題能有深刻的認識、反省與批判，期能建立個人教學立論，並積極展現在教學實務的運用上。
goals: 探討教學理論的發展脈絡與研究趨勢
認識重要教學理論的內涵及其實務運用
認識重要教學議題的內涵及其在教學實務上的意義
反省個人的教學信念/重建個人的教師知識
syllabus:
1.課程簡介；個人教學觀點的反思

Try to define & clarify the concepts of “instruction,”“teaching,”and “pedagogy.”

**（一）教學概念**

2.教學概念的分析與批判

歐陽教（1988）。教學的觀念分析。載於黃光雄（主編），**教學原理**（頁1-27）。台北，師大書苑。

單文經（2001）。教學的本義與引申義。載於單文經著，**教學引論**（頁4-17）。台北，學富。

Fenstermacher, G. D. (1986). Philosophy of Research on Teaching: Three Aspects. In M. C.

Wittrock, (Ed.), _Handbook of Research on Teaching (3rd ed._) (pp. 37-49). New York: Macmillan.

**（二）教學理論**

3.學習理論與教學原理(I)

甄曉蘭（1997）。教學理論。載於黃政傑（主編），**教學原理**。台北：師大書苑。

李咏吟（1998）。**認知教學：理論與策略**。台北：心理。

林清山（2000）。學習理論與教學心理學研究的互動。**教育研究集刊，****45**，1-13。

Glaser, R. (1982). Instructional psychology: Past, present, and future. _American_

_Psychologist_, 37(3), 292-305.

Glaser, R. (1990). The reemergence of learning theory within instructional research. _American Psychologist_, 45(1), 29-39.

Resnick, L. B. (1989). Introduction. In L. B. Resnick (Ed.). _Knowing learning and instruction: Essays in honor of Robert Glaser_ (pp. 1-24). Hilsdale, NJ: Erlbaum.

4.學習理論與教學原理(II)

\*岳修平譯（2000）。教學心理學（一版二刷）。台北，遠流。

Gredler, M. E. (1997). _Learning and instruction: Theory into practice_ (3rd ed.). Upper Saddle River, NJ: Merril.（中文譯本係根據該書二版）

Oser, F. K., & Baeriswyl, F. J. (2001). Choreographies of teaching: Bridging instruction to learning. In V. Richardson (Ed.), _Handbook of research on teaching (4th ed.)_ (pp. 1031-1065). New York, NY: American Educational Research Association

**（三）教學研究的趨勢**

5.教學研究的趨勢—典範的轉移

Shulman, L. S. (1986). Paradigms and research programs in the study of teaching: A contemporary perspective. In M.Wittrock (Ed.), _Handbook of research on teaching (3rd ed.)_ (pp. 3-36). New York, NY: Macmillan.

Donmoyer, R. (2001). Paradigm talk reconsidered. In V. Richardson (Ed.), _Handbook of research on teaching (4th ed.)_ (pp. 174-197). New York, NY: American Educational Research Association.

6.教學研究的趨勢—方法的改變

陳奎憙（1990）。教學的涵義及其研究方法論。載於陳奎憙，**教育社會學研究**（頁99-130）。台北：師大書苑。

簡紅珠（2004）。教學研究的多元典範發展趨勢與研究方法之省思。載於中華民國課程與教學學會主編，**課程與教學研究之發展與前瞻**（頁25-39）。台北，高等教育。

Anderson, L. W. & Burns, R. B. (1989). Studying classroom. In _Research in classroom: The study of teacher, teaching and instruction_ (pp. 45-82). New York: Pergamon Press.

Floden, R. E. (2001). Research on effects of teaching: A continuing model for research on teaching. In V. Richardson (Ed.), _Handbook of research on teaching (4th ed.)_ (pp. 3-16). New York, NY: American Educational Research Association.

7.教學研究的趨勢—議題的更新

黃政傑（1997），教學研究與教學革新。載於黃政傑（主編），**教學原理**（頁439-465）。台北，師大書苑。

Hamilton, D., & McWilliam, E. (2001). Ex-Centric voices that frame research on teaching. In V. Richardson (Ed.), _Handbook of research on teaching (4th ed.)_ (pp. 17-43). New York, NY: American Educational Research Association.

Moll, L. C. (2001). Through the mediation of others: Vygotskian research on teaching. In V. Richardson (Ed.), _Handbook of research on teaching (4th ed.)_ (pp.111-129). New York, NY: American Educational Research Association.

**（四）教學評鑑**

8.教學評鑑相關議題

Shepard, L. A. (2001). The roles of classroom assessment in teaching and learning. In V. Richardson (Ed.), _Handbook of research on teaching (4th ed.)_ (pp. 1066-1101). New York, NY: American Educational Research Association.

**（五）教師知識**（Teacher Knowledge）

9.教師必須具備甚麼知識？(What do teachers need to know?)

教師為什麼必須具備這些知識？(Why do teachers need to know such knowledge?)

教師知識與任教學科、年級、學生有關？抑或是一般性的？(Does it matter what subjects, grade levels, or students they teach, or is teacher knowledge generic?)

Shulman, L. (1987). Knowledge and teaching: Foundations of the new reform. _Harvard Educational Review_, _57_(1), 1-22.

 (閱讀不同學科有關教師知識的相關研究論文，並且上網[www.nbpts.org](http://www.nbpts.org/)查閱美國國家教師專業標準(National Board for Professional Teaching Standards)的內容，試著提出個人對教師知識的見解，於11/27上課時提出報告)

10.還有甚麼是教師需要知道的？ (What else do teachers need to know?)

Cochran-Smith, M. (1995). Color blindness and basket making are not the answers: Confronting the dilemmas of race, culture, and language diversity in teacher education. _American Educational Research Journal_, _32_(3), 493-522.

Lyons, N. (1990). Dilemmas of knowing: Ethical and epistemological dimensions of teacher’s work and development. _Harvard Educational Review_, _60_(2), 159-180.

11.教師知識之我見－口頭報告 (Oral Report on Perspectives of Teacher Knowledge)
